name: Score Sheets: Who's the best?
description:
Score Sheets is an easy to use tool to keep track of the scores during a game. You will never use paper and pencil again! Add as many players as you want and start playing your favorite game. The intuitive keyboard enables fast writing and the sum is calculated instantly. Save and restore games if you want to continue later.

No longer disputes about who is the designated person to keep track of the scores!

Features

• Unlimited sheets, players and rounds
• Scores are added up instantly
• Optimized keyboard
• Save and restore games
• Share results
